utkrAqmO-da#kramIqditiq dvAByAqmutkra#mayatiq prati#ShThityAq anu#rUpAByAqM tasmAqdanu#rUpAH paqSavaqH prajA#yantEq &pa upa# sRujatiq yatraq vA Apa# upaq gacCa#ntiq tadOSha#dhayaqH prati# tiShThaqntyOSha#dhIH pratiqtiShTha#ntIH paqSavO&nuq prati# tiShThanti paqSUn. yaqj~jO yaqj~jaM ~Myaja#mAnOq yaja#mAnaM praqjAstasmA#daqpa 
upa# sRujatiq prati#ShThityaiq yada#ddhvaqryu-ra#naqgnAvAhu#tiM juhuqyAdaqndhO$ &ddhvaqryuH - [  ] 11
